attributes.action: Remove the NHS out of politics and have the organisation run by a strategic committee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To safeguard the NHS from knee jerk reactions by political parties looking for short term solutions to boost their ratings the NHS should be run separately by a strategic committee.  The committee setting out the longterm direction and funding of the NHS. This will hopefully stop the NHS going from feast to famine depending on which party is in power.
